name: Sea Match 3 - Match 3 Games, Free Matching Games
name_original: Sea Match 3 - Match 3 Games, Free Matching Games
description:
Sea Match 3 is the fun match-3 game, Create matchs of 3 or more in a row or column by taping on pieces to swap.

Feature:
- Tilt & Touch controls.
- Amazing graphics and sound effects.
- 15 different levels.
